name: 葛瑞斐
objective: Through class discussion and group presentations, this course will help develop students’ English conversation skills.  In the course of practicing such skills, we will explore the concept of conversation as story-telling, in particular a mutual exchange of stories.  Our topics will include: stories from film and other forms of popular culture;  stories and their genres (romance, science fiction, horror, adventure);  descriptive accounts of paintings and objects;  non-fiction accounts of historical people and events;  narratives of our own personal history and invention.
